headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Hershey (HSY) After Its Strong 1 Year Rally?
summary: If you are considering whether Hershey is priced fairly today or if the recent run leaves more room to grow, this article is for you. Hershey shares last closed at US$230.85, with returns of 12.2% over 7 days, 19.5% over 30 days, 26.6% year to date, 50.8% over 1 year, 5.4% over 3 years and 71.9% over 5 years. Recent coverage has focused on Hershey as a long established consumer brand in the US food, beverage and tobacco space, with investors paying close attention to how branded snack...

headline: Pilgrim's Pride Q4 Earnings Lag Estimates, Sales Up 3.3% Y/Y
